thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Joseph

author: Joseph
title: Joseph
text: I was after an Arc'teryx Proton AR jacket for hiking and by chance I came across LD Mountain Centre. The website is laid out in an easy to read and search manner with great detail on the products on sale. I found my jacket and was also received a pop up discount code for Â£5.00 reducing my discounted purchase further - winner! The checkout process is quick and simple and delivery is also very quick (3 days from order), given I live in the southern Hebrides and sometimes it takes an age to get here, this impressed me greatly! I highly recommend LD Mountain Centre and will definitely use them for future purchases.
